reviewText:
I agree with the other reviewer when they said there's not much info on this DVD. It doesn't even show how to fire the clay with a torch (which most people do), only a kiln. It shows beautiful jewelry on the cover which is very deceiving because the DVD doesn't include instructions on how to make these pieces!
Complete waste of money.
I get almost as much info free from youtube or browsing free articles. I suppose it is great for someone that knows nothing yet. I was disappointed.
